description:
My place is close to Soho's finest. You’ll love my place because of the people, the neighborhood, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). COZY! Best shopping in NYC just a 5 minute walk, local train stations to take you anywhere you would want to go in nyc!  Great restruants, 2 blocks from the beautiful Hudson River. Quiet building with just two neighbors. Please make yourself at home, come enjoy NYC at its finest!

This is cozy cozy! Fully carpeted brand new carpet, typically no shoes in the house, family home for you to feel right at home

The place will be yours! I will introduce you to the home and it's yours!

I will get you settled and show you around my home and the keys and privacy are yours!

Soho is the leading shopping area in all of Manhattan, less than a 5 minute walk and you're there. Wonderful dining and cafes, delis,, 2 blocks from the picturess Hudson River, very quiet block, only 2 quiet neighbors, safe, multiple rooftop bar and lounges walking distance, not to mention 2 separate trains are only 2 blocks away from anywhere else you may want Togo!
name: Cozy, Queen 1 bedroom, Toddler room in ❤️ Of Soho!
